description:
User casts a bright light above the enemies. The light
then bursts dealing damage and blinding enemies.
name: Bright Burst

description:
User channels the sun's power into a condensed beam and
shoots it at an enemy. Thaws enemies.
name: Sunfire Beam

description:
User physically manifests his spirit and blasts it
at all enemies. This deals physical damage.
name: Soul Blast

description: Heal an ally for 50% of their health.
name: Rejuvenate

description:
Channel the power of the good of humans into a 
beam and shoots it a targeted enemy for massive damage.
name: Holy Judgement

description:
Charge full speed at the enemies, dealing physical  
damage to a random enemy.
name: Holy Blitz

description:
Readies the sword and cuts the air, dealing air damage
to the enemy. This move always goes first.
name: Wind Slash

description:
Spins the sword in a circle and attacks the enemy,
dealing repeated damage.
name: Spin Slash

description:
Swing the sword with such force on an enemy that it
causes other enemies to take damage as well.
name: Heavy Swing

description:
Make an ice pillar appear from under the enemy. Deals
50% extra damage to frozen enemies.
name: Chilling Cataclysm

description:
Enlarges the sword and swings across the line of 
enemies, dealing damage to all enemies.
name: Ragnarok

description:
Manifest the hardships of being human and forces the 
enemy to experience it all at once, dealing big damage.
name: Holy Sin

description:
Condenses hellfire into a ball and is launched at the
enemy. Deals 30% of damage as splash damage.
name: Hellfire Burnbomb

description:
Create multiple dark shadows and then attack the 
enemies at random.
name: Dark Frenzy

description:
Make the enemy hallucinate, causing them to be
confused.
name: Hallucination

description:
Slice the air, transforming the sliced air into 
a dark wave, damaging all enemies.
name: Umbra Wave

description:
Give a sleeping enemy nightmares, dealing large damage.
If the enemy is not asleep, this deals no damage.
name: Nightmare

description:
Channel the darkness inside the heart and focus it
into a beam and shoot it the enemies.
name: Tainted Beam

description:
Go into rage, making him berserk, and buff his attack 
by 50%. Cannot use skills during this duration.
name: Seething Rage

description:
Channels power from human sins and condenses it into a
ball and hurled at the enemy, dealing massive damage.
name: Dark Sin

description:
Dispel a wave of fear into the hearts of the enemies,
dealing damage to them all.
name: Fear Wave

description:
Cast wisps that disorients the enemy, making them
confused.
name: Disorienting Wisps

description:
Encase the enemy in ice, damaging them and potentially
freezing them.
name: Dark Ice

description:
Summon the flames from the depths of Hell
onto an enemy. Will thaw enemies.
name: Hell Scorch

description:
Jolt the enemy with lightning, dealing damage to them.
May paralyze the enemy.
name: Spark

description: Cast a shadow and have it strike the enemy.
name: Shadow Strike

description:
Summon an invisible poltergeist that bites all the 
enemies, dealing damage.
name: Poltergeist's Force

description:
Casts a shadow that grabs ahold of the enemy,
binding them.
name: Shadow Bind

description:
Cast a blood ritual that allows the user to steal the
enemy's life force and receive 30% of it as the user's.
name: Blood Ritual

description:
Cast a wind of darkness. The wind's debris does damage
to an enemy and has a chance to buff all stats.
name: Dark Wind

description:
Summons a giant ghost that slams its foot down on
the enemy with such force it damages others.
name: Ghost Slam

description:
Conjure a sinister plot, increasing magic attack by
25% for the next three turns.
name: Sinister Plot

description: Curse an enemy, silencing them for 3 to 5 turns.
name: Spell Curse

description: Revive an ally.
name: Revival

description:
Play a song so beautiful, it heals the team for 30%
of their max health.
name: Hymn of Healing

description: Summon a magical rune that cleanses the target.
name: Rune of Purity

description: Buff an ally's defense by 25% for 3 turns.
name: Magic Armor

description: Debuff an enemy's defense by 25% for 3 turns.
name: Shatter

description: Lowers enemy magic attack by 25% for 3 turns.
name: Disrupt

description: Lowers all enemy accuracy by 75% for 2 to 4 turns.
name: Light Flare

description: Silences an enemy for 3 to 5 turns.
name: Exorcism

description: Buff an ally's attack by 25% for 3 turns.
name: Anger Invocation

description: Lowers enemy attack by 25% by 3 turns.
name: Calm Wave

description:
Physically manifest a spirit and whips an enemy.
Deals physical damage.
name: Spirit Whip

description:
Take control of the enemy's mind and cause so much
pain that it causes it to become physical.
name: Mind Surge

description:
Physically manifest multiple spirit rockets and fires
them at the enemies.
name: Mind Rocket

description:
Pray for the enemy to atone for their sins. Only 
works on darklings.
name: Atonement

description:
Cast an aura that grants the team a magic attack buff
by 15% for three turns.
name: Aura of Divine Fury

description:
Take control of the target's mind and causes
them to feel like their head imploded.
name: Burst of Mind Control

description: Put a spell on the target and make them fall asleep.
name: Dream

description: Throw daggers at two targets.
name: Rake

description:
Throw a piece of wood and splinters it by throwing a
dagger at it, causing shrapnel to dig into the targets.
name: Splinter

description:
Throw a dagger at the target's lung, causing them to
bleed slowly for the rest of the battle.
name: Asphyxiate

description:
Brutally assault the target with the hilt of a weapon.
Can cause the enemy to be paralyzed.
name: Massacre

description:
Slice off a piece of flesh from the target dealing
massive damage.
name: Lacerate

description:
Find the most vulnerable spot on the target and 
punctures that spot, causing them to bleed.
name: Puncture

damage.formula: if (b.isStateAffected(9) || b.isStateAffected(11))(2 * (47 + a.atk - b.def));else(47 + a.atk - b.def);

description:
Burns the target with heated weapon. If the target is 
bleeding or hemorrhaging, deal double damage. Thaws.
name: Cauterize

description:
Throws four daggers at an enemy, 
dealing damage.
name: Knife Throw

description: Spin with incredible speed and attack random targets.
name: Slicing Typhoon

description:
Slash the enemy with a dagger imbued with ice magic.
Has a chance to freeze.
name: Frostbite

description: Speed up an ally by 25% for 3 turns.
name: Hasten

description: Damage enemy and lower their speed by 25% for 3 turns.
name: Cripple

description: Throw a poison tonic that makes an enemy poisoned.
name: Poison Tonic

description:
Throw a stink bomb that smells so bad, it blinds
the target.
name: Stink Bomb

description: Throw a potion that paralyzes the enemy.
name: Neutralizing Potion

description: Heals an ally for 35% of their max health.
name: Health Potion

description:
Throw a sticky concoction that goes wrong and explodes
all over the enemies, slowing them.
name: Sticky Concoction

description:
Throw an acidic brew that causes damage with a chance
of poisoning.
name: Acidic Brew

description:
Throw a flask of hellfire at the target, dealing damage.
Thaws frozen targets.
name: Hellfire Flask

description:
Give an ally a sanitizing potion, clearing all status
conditions they had.
name: Sanitizing Potion

description: Give an ally a speed flask, making them faster by 25%.
name: Speed Flask

description: Boost an ally's magic attack and magic defense by 15%.
name: Tonic of Enhanced Senses

description: Give an antidote to the target, curing their poison.
name: Antidote

description:
Throw a brew of liquid nitrogen at the target, dealing
damage and freezing them
name: Liquid Nitrogen

description: Throw this potion at a target, making them sleep.
name: Goodnight Potion

description: Makes an enemy hysterical which makes them confused.
name: Hysteria

description: Whip a target.
name: Whiplash

description:
Slam the whip into the ground with such force that
stones shoot up from under the targets.
name: Ground Slam

description: Whip the target with enough force to make them bleed.
name: Scar

description:
Wrap the whip around the target, binding the target and
slowing the target.
name: Strangle

description:
Whip the enemy and entangles them, causing them to
go last for the next 3 turns.
name: Snare

description:
Grab a target with the whip and send a massive electric
current through their body.
name: Electrocute

description:
Paralyze an enemy with your whip by grabbing them and
sending a small electric current.
name: Taze

description: Grab the enemy with the whip and knock them out.
name: Knockout

description:
Slam the ground with the incredible force of a golem
causing the ground to rapture.
name: Aries' Power

description:
Set up a magical defensive barrier, mitigating all
damage by 50% for a turn.
name: Taurus' Power

description:
Create four duplicates and attack the enemies 
randomly.
name: Gemini's Power

description: Summon nine blades and whirls them towards a target.
name: Cancer's Power

description:
Channel the lion's spirit and boosts attack and 
magic attack by 25% for 2 turns.
name: Leo's Power

description: Curse the enemy with an incantation, silencing them.
name: Virgo's Power

description:
Shift the weight and slam it down on an enemy. Deal
30% of damage to other enemies as splash damage.
name: Libra's Power

description:
Transform into a spider, hornet, scorpion, or a
parasite for an attack based on the insect.
name: Scorpio's Power

description:
Create a makeshift bow and fires an arrow of volatile
air towards the enemies.
name: Sagittarius' Power

description: Use telekinetic powers to confuse the enemy.
name: Capricorn's Power

description:
Envelop the team with holy water. Regenerate 15%
health for 3 turns.
name: Aquarius' Power

description:
Shape shift into another zodiac warrior. Cannot control
the transformations, but the effects are doubled.
name: Pisces' Power

description:
Attack a target and gain 30% of the damage back 
as health.
name: Blood Sucker

description:
Summons a sword of light at a target. 
Will deal no damage to non-darklings.
name: Sword of Light

description:
Summon a sword of darkness at a target. 
Will deal no damage to darklings.
name: Sword of Darkness

description:
Strike the ground, causing an ice pillar to rise under
the enemy. Deals double damage if the enemy is frozen.
name: Ice Breaker

description:
Call upon the fallen knights of the round table and
have them charge the enemy ranks.
name: Call of the Knights

description:
Call upon King Arthur himself to attack all the 
enemies at once.
name: Call of the King

description:
Plants the sword into the ground, giving an aura of
superhuman speed and agility. Attack enemy with fists.
name: Vigor

description: Go berserk.
name: Blazing Fury

description:
Spin the sword with such power and speed that it causes
a small tornado to appear at the enemies.
name: Slash Wave

description:
Engulf the sword in ice and attack the enemy.
Has a chance to freeze.
name: Frostblade

description:
Summon several Sword of Light and then summons an 
Excalibur of light and has it rain down on the enemy.
name: Rain of Swords

description: Slash at an enemy twice.
name: Dual Slash

description: Throw the sword at the enemy.
name: Javelin Throw

description:
Let out a warcry that buffs his team's speed and
attack by 15% for 2 turns.
name: Warcry

description:
Call upon the army of Camelot. The army attacks the
enemies, hitting each random enemy nine times.
name: Call of the Dead

description:
Cast a light above the enemy. Then it bursts and deals
damage to the enemy.
name: Flare Burst

description:
Set up a magical defensive barrier, mitigating all
damage for a turn.
name: Taurus' Full Power

description:
Create four duplicates and attack the enemies 
randomly.
name: Gemini's Full Power

description:
Summon nine blades and whirls them in a blade towards
an enemy.
name: Cancer's Full Power

description:
Channel the lion's spirit and boosts attack and 
magic attack by 50% for 2 turns.
name: Leo's Full Power

description:
Curse the enemy with an incantation, making the unable
to use skills.
name: Virgo's Full Power

description:
Shift the weight and slam it down on an enemy. Deal
30% of damage to other enemies as splash damage.
name: Libra's Full Power

description:
Transform into a spider, hornet, scorpion, or a
parasite for an attack based on the insect.
name: Scorpio's Full Power

description:
Create a makeshift bow and fires an arrow of air
towards the enemies.
name: Sagittarius' Full Power

description:
Use telekinetic powers to make
the enemy go insane.
name: Capricorn's Full Power

description:
Summon a rain cloud above the team. Regenerate 15%
health for 6 turns.
name: Aquarius' Full Power

description:
Summons a ghost that haunts the enemy, causing them
to take damage and be confused.
name: Summon: Ghost
